```{r}
# Matrice de coût exemple
generate_matrix <- function(n) {
  matrix(apply(matrix(1:n, n, n, byrow = TRUE), 1, sample), 
         nrow = n, byrow = TRUE)
}
cost_matrix<-generate_matrix(10)
cost_matrix
```


```{r}
# Algorithme Hongrois
result_hungarian <- hungarian_algorithm(cost_matrix)
result_hungarian_cpp <- hungarian_algorithm_cpp(cost_matrix)
# Afficher les résultats
print(result_hungarian)
print(result_hungarian_cpp)
```

```{r}
# Algorithme Génétique
result_genetic <- genetic_algorithm_assignment(cost_matrix)
result_genetic_cpp <- genetic_algorithm_cpp(cost_matrix)
print(result_genetic)
print(1+result_genetic_cpp)
```
